#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
	int N;
	int n = 0;
	int o, p;
	priority_queue< int, vector<int>, greater<int> > T;
	priority_queue< int > R;
	scanf("%d",&N);
 
	for (int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++){
		scanf("%d",&o);
		if (o == 2) if (T.empty()) printf("No reviews yet\n"); else printf("%d\n", T.top());
		if (o == 1) {
			n++;
			scanf("%d",&p);
			if (!T.empty() && T.top() < p){
				R.push(T.top());
				T.pop();
				T.push(p);
			}else R.push(p);
 
			if ((n / 3) >= T.size() + 1){
				T.push(R.top());
				R.pop();
			}
		}
	}
}
